Definition: In this task, you are given two events, Head and Tail, which are separated by <sep>. PersonX is always the subject of the Head event. You have to determine whether the Head event happens before the Tail event or not, and output "Yes" or "No" accordingly. The phrase may also contain "___", a placeholder that can be an object, a person, and/or an action.
Domains: Commonsense -> Concepts and Relations -> Social Commonsense
Commonsense -> Concepts and Relations -> Spatial Commonsense

Positive Examples.input: Head: PersonX swims at the local pool<sep>Tail: PersonX learns a new way of swimming
Positive Examples.explanation: This is a good example. The Head happens before the Tail.

Positive Examples.input: Head: PersonX acts as PersonY intermediary<sep>Tail: assist and protect PersonY's interests
Positive Examples.explanation: In this example, the Head and the Tail can happen at the same time. So the output should be"No".

Positive Examples.input: Head: PersonX gets new glasses<sep>Tail: PersonX reads the tiny print on the bottle
Positive Examples.explanation: In this example, getting new glasses happens before reading the tiny print on the bottle. Thus, this example should be classified as "Yes".

Negative Examples.input: Head: PersonX acts like a PersonY<sep>Tail: to observe
Negative Examples.explanation: Observing is not an event that happens before the Head. So the output should be "No".

Negative Examples.input: Head: PersonX tries to fix it<sep>Tail: PersonX orders new glass
Negative Examples.explanation: Trying to fix happens before ordering new glass, and the output should be "Yes".

Instances.input: Head: PersonX accidentally shot<sep>Tail: PersonX puts the gun away
Head: PersonX adapts the ___ to the needs<sep>Tail: PersonX learns something new
Head: PersonX proves PersonY wrong<sep>Tail: PersonX gloats about their intelligence
Head: PersonX achieves PersonX's goal<sep>Tail: over-joyed
Head: PersonX accepts ___ as PersonX's savior<sep>Tail: the eternal life
Head: PersonX seems to work<sep>Tail: PersonX gets caught by his boss
Head: PersonX lives happily ever after<sep>Tail: PersonX has many children
Head: PersonX accepts ___ as PersonX's savior<sep>Tail: pray
